about.title: About Me
about.description:
My name is Antonis Ekatommatis, and I am a software developer with a passion for continuous learning and technological advancement. I graduated from the University of Piraeus with a degree in Computer Science, gaining a strong foundation in programming and software development.

My professional philosophy is based on the continuous pursuit of knowledge, as I believe that constant growth is the key to innovation and success in any project. I focus primarily on Full Stack Development, with a preference for backend technologies, while always seeking new challenges that allow me to expand my skills and contribute meaningfully to the development of technological solutions.

I live in Chios, but my passion for technology and programming innovation knows no boundaries. My goal is to evolve into a top-tier developer, leveraging my knowledge to create efficient, reliable, and modern applications.
